TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit HttpModuleCollection extends System.Collections.Specialized.NameObjectCollectionBase
Public NotInheritable Class HttpModuleCollection Inherits NameObjectCollectionBase

summary.span: 提供一种方法，用以索引并检索 对象的集合。

span.span: Provides a way to index and retrieve a collection of objects.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示属性和和方法类。The following code example demonstrates the property and the and methods of the class. 此示例获取当前请求的应用程序对象从当前对象。The example gets the application object for the current request from the current object. 它然后提取从应用程序实例的对象显示的名称和对象。It then extracts the object from the application instance and displays the names of the objects.
